snippet: The U. S. Open reached an emotional climax on Sunday as the year's final grand slam paused amid heavy security before the start of the men's singles to remember those who died in the 9/11 attacks 15 years ago....
lead_paragraph: The U. S. Open reached an emotional climax on Sunday as the year's final grand slam paused amid heavy security before the start of the men's singles to remember those who died in the 9/11 attacks 15 years ago.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Open Pauses to Remember 9/11 Under Heavy Security
headline.main: U.S. Open Pauses to Remember 9/11 Under Heavy Security
